QuestData.Title: Nisha's Vengeance
QuestData.Description: Since I left on my last hunt, the Iron Horde have drawn nearer and reinforced their positions.$b$b<A grin spreads across Rexxar's lips.>$b$bThey've created a target-rich environment.$b$bI must continue nursing Nisha to health for now. You go in my stead, friend. Fill them with the fear and pain that they inflicted on her.$b$bMake their screams fill the canyon!
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you, $n. Nisha is nearly returned to health.
